LanguageData.PlantRaspberry.label: raspberry bush
LanguageData.PlantRaspberry.description: Bushy plant with delicious red berries.
LanguageData.PlantBush.label: bush
LanguageData.PlantBush.description: Short shrub. Does not typically talk.
LanguageData.PlantGrass.label: grass
LanguageData.PlantGrass.description: Wild grass. Grows anywhere there is a little light and minimally fertile ground.
LanguageData.PlantDandelion.label: dandelions
LanguageData.PlantDandelion.description: Common small flower. Though it is often considered a weed because of its fecundity, it is pleasant to look at
LanguageData.PlantTreeOak.label: oak tree
LanguageData.PlantTreeOak.description: A strong hardwood tree. Slow-going, but its wood is very strong.
LanguageData.PlantTreePoplar.label: poplar tree
LanguageData.PlantTreePoplar.description: A softwood tree. Grows fast, but its wood isn't very strong.
